situation.title: Caregiver’s allowance for self-employed II
situation.meta_description: Terms and conditions for the program Caregiver’s allowance for self-employed II.

content.processed:
Taking care of a family member for CZK 400 / day for the period from November 10th until November 31st, 2020.

 

Taking care of a family member for CZK 400 / day for the period from

Validity
Applications are accepted from November 9th until December 9th, 2020.

Program Rules
The program is intended for self-employed people who are looking after children up to 10 years of age, dependent children up to 26 years of age and dependent individuals on at least level 1 of dependency.

The money is intended only for the self-employed with self-employment as their main activity, therefore:

  • the partners of ltd., joint-stock company, limited partnership or public company cannot apply
  • the recipients of parental allowance and people living with the recipient of parental allowance in the same household cannot apply
  • the recipients of the maternity cash benefit and people living with the recipient of the maternity cash benefit in the same household cannot apply
  • the pension recipients (invalidity, widow's, old-age) who are self-employed as their side activity cannot apply
  • nor those who pursue self-employment only as their side activity due to looking after a disabled person.

The care-giver’s allowance for the self-employed cannot be combined with the Compensation Bonus, which will be paid by the Ministry of Finance.

Application

  1. Confirmation of the closure of a school or other facility will not be required, this will be required only in justified cases by a request sent to the applicant.
  2. You can submit your application through the MIT form at: www.mpo.cz/osetrovneosvc
  3. In-person submissions are not possible for hygienic reasons. Applications submitted by the data box are preferred - it will be paid out much earlier.
